affiliate.title: Affiliate
affiliate.note1: +Make sure to introduce at least 5 new members to GoStream each month
affiliate.note2: +There are at least 1 member paying the fee in the month
affiliate.note3: +Your account needs at least 1 million to be eligible for withdrawal
affiliate.note4: +The offending member will be deleted the accumulated amount
affiliate.note5: +Contact fanpage when eligible to withdraw or have questions to answer.
affiliate.rule1: -Please read carefully the 'Conditions of Participation' before clicking the Join button
affiliate.rule2: -You will be given a link to the GoStream registration page, which represents your account
affiliate.rule3: -You use this link to send to other customers and guide them to register
affiliate.rule4: -Those who subscribe via your link will receive a 10% discount for the first purchase. And you will get 20% of all their payments

plan.title: Plan
plan.mini_game: Limited mini game | Unlimited mini game |
plan.auto_share: No auto share | Auto share : yes |
plan.ranking: No ranking user | Ranking user | Ranking user {count} targets
plan.ads: Our watermark | No watermark | Your custom watermark

attention.title: Attention
attention.max_resolution: The maximum resolution of Facebook livestream is 720p. Sometime Facebook downgrade video resolution even we send high resolution
attention.youtube_resolution: Livestream to youtube only show the correct resolution if the video ratio is 16:9 (1280/720). If not, you'll see lower resolution
attention.mini_game: Mini game only works with livestream on Facebook. Please watch tutorial videos on each page if you don't understand

ads.title: Watermark on video
ads.value: Text gostream.co | No text | Custom text & logo

giftcode.title: Gift code
giftcode.desc: Please enter the gift code. Note that the new plan will overwrite the existing package without refund. Please consider before use
giftcode.note1: Buy giftcode to sell to other customers can't pay online
giftcode.note2: Super profitable business opportunity with GoStream.
giftcode.note3: The more you buy, the bigger the rose. Maximum discount up to 50% (800 codes).
